questions.question: What protocol does Claude Code use for external tool integration?
questions.explanation: Claude Code uses Model Context Protocol (MCP) for integrating external tools like Puppeteer and Slack.

questions.question: Which scope option was added to the enhanced /review command?
questions.explanation: The --scope=security option was added to focus code reviews on security concerns.

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of the new hooks system in Claude Code?
options: Custom workflow automation with pre/post action triggers
questions.explanation: The hooks system allows developers to automate custom workflows by triggering scripts before and after Claude Code actions, such as running tests or formatting code.

questions.question: Which new collaboration feature helps teams share Claude Code configurations?
questions.explanation: Project-level CLAUDE.md files allow teams to share consistent instructions and conventions across team members, improving collaboration and code quality.

questions.question: What improvement was made to performance monitoring in January 2025?
options: Real-time token usage tracking and cost estimation
questions.explanation: The January 2025 update introduced real-time token usage tracking and cost estimation, helping developers monitor their Claude Code usage and manage costs effectively.
